channel.title: Arcaneous || Beta || Pk - Spawn/Eco || JOIN NOW!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3dsrRn0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mhk4wrE.png[/img] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=3][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/3vpye.png[/img] [url=http://"http://www.arcaneous.net/"]Website[/url] | [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/6duwsk.png[/img] [url=http://"http://arcaneous.net/community/"]Community[/url] | [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s1reqe.png[/img] [url=http://"http://arcaneous.net/play.html"]Play Now[/url][/size][/FONT] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YBk6gk9.png[/img] [SIZE=2][B]Arcaneous[/B] is a brand new private server that brings to its players all new content in spectacular HD. Whilst maintaining an economy [B]Arcaneous[/B] allows players to spawn their gear with our unique spawn tab and get straight into PvP. Not a fan of PvP? No problem! Arcaneous offers the finest PvM and skilling to keep you entertained and to allow for the economy to thrive. Our Difficulty system allows players to choose their own way to play, whether it is frequently or casually, the choice is yours! Earn special items and benefits for playing on harder difficulties. If you are looking for a server where you can play your own way and enjoy brand new content weekly, then look no further. [B]Arcaneous[/B] aims to keep the enjoyment in playing an RSPS and tries not overcomplicate things. Lets be honest, people play private servers because they don't seek the challenge the real Runescape offers. This is why we have multiple game modes. Players can play their own way![/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gdf061b.png[/img]
[CENTER] Green = Finished Orange = Started Red = Not Started Skills: Attack Defence Ranged Prayer Magic Constitution Runecrafting Crafting Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Agility Herblore Thieving Fletching Slayer Hunter Summoning Farming Dungeoneering Construction Bosses: Queen Black Dragon King Black Dragon Nex Corporeal Beast Kree'arra - Armadyl General Graardor - Bandos Commander Zilyana - Saradomin K'ril Tsutsaroth - Zamorak Kalphite Queen Chaos Elemental Minigames: Clan Wars Castle Wars Fight Caves Godwars Dungeon Dominion Tower Fight Kiln Barrows Soul Wars Pest Control Stealing Creation Misc: - Co-Op Slayer - Clans - Survival Minigame (Custom) - Shooting Stars - Raiding System (Custom) [B]Recent Updates:[/B] - Setup store at egeville - Added portal with teleport interface and teleports! - Customized interface and added teleports with some dialogues - Added New npc's and re-arranged diaogues - Added Spawn Tab - Cleaned up names of the server on interfaces - Added new special teleports for Home Portal - Added Arcane Point Store, Added Max with store - Added new simple starter tutorial - added starter gear (Including a Bag of Runes which when opened gives runes) - created different difficulties with different XP rates - added Difficulty selection after tutorial - Added Difficulty Re-setter to reset def, lock XP and change Difficulty at any time. - Added ability to teleport in 40- wildy for Legends and God's - Added increased spec restore for Legends and Gods - Added ::mode (Shows players what game mode you are playing on) - Made the wilderness ditch turn off your skin overrides when entering wildy - Cleaned up commands list - Added Completionist Cape Stand - Added Herblore store with full potion Decanting! - Added Fishing Spawns - Re-made Summoning (Added shop and working Obelisk) - Stabled XP RATES! (Few rates still need work) - Added Arcane Points for 99's - Fixed up prices for Skins - Added working Artefact for QBD and KBD teleport - Added missing NPCS (Slayer, Jadinkos, Glacors, Polypore dung) - Added Bandits Teleport for training - Added bonuses to a few items - Added special starter gear for Legend and God modes - Added TzHaar whip Upgrade - Added Arcane Points for killing bosses - Added New Slayer system - Added Slayer Points system - Added Slayer Teleports - Added Crystal Chest with Crystal Key creation and Caskets - Added Item on Item Smithing (Gano, Dfs etc) - Brand New Client! V1 - Armour Sets added - ::gear command added (admins only currently) - Point stores add with point systems working - Fountain of Heroes added - Added Slayer Helmet creation and Flower game - Simple Livid Farm minigame added (Needs improvements) - Bones on Altar added/ Prayer XP Stabled - Added untradable items - Added Musician Resting (Needs to multiply rate still) - Cache Sprites Fixed - Fixed Prices - Added Spawns to Novice Spawn Button - Setup PvP Killstream rewards (Still need more work) - Added PvP Points and custom PvP Store [/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l8qOJzH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pIdT0UX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nsrldEr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1s0rQCW.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xyZAZD2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G9avLHQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y6z8Dpj.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TN3VnTw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dFQaMTu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zIakoXL.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R1KDupG.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ARtJi68.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/olgFAUl.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Iicke57.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6abmahQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xqOdvAt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qUQ8sZS.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oUeIOLH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EM2DcAF.png[/img] [B][SIZE=4]Much more to come...![/B] Credits: Matrix Development Team, King J Scape (For Cache) Developer & Owner: Arcane Start date: January 2014 Thanks for reading! [/center]

item.title: Arcaneous || Beta || Pk - Spawn/Eco || JOIN NOW!
item.dc:creator: @Ir0ny Ir0ny
item.description:
@Ir0ny wrote:

[center]

[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=3] Website | Community | Play Now[/size][/FONT]

[SIZE=2][B]Arcaneous[/B] is a brand new private server that brings to its players all new content in spectacular HD.
Whilst maintaining an economy [B]Arcaneous[/B] allows players to spawn their gear with our unique spawn tab and get straight into PvP. Not a fan of PvP? No problem! Arcaneous offers the finest PvM and skilling to keep you entertained and to allow for the economy to thrive.
Our Difficulty system allows players to choose their own way to play, whether it is frequently or casually, the choice is yours! Earn special items and benefits for playing on harder difficulties. If you are looking for a server where you can play your own way and enjoy brand new content weekly, then look no further.

[B]Arcaneous[/B] aims to keep the enjoyment in playing an RSPS and tries not overcomplicate things. Lets be honest, people play private servers because they don’t seek the challenge the real Runescape offers. This is why we have multiple game modes. Players can play their own way![/SIZE]

[CENTER] Green = Finished Orange = Started Red = Not Started

Skills:
Attack
Defence
Ranged
Prayer
Magic
Constitution
Runecrafting
Crafting
Mining
Smithing
Fishing
Cooking
Firemaking
Woodcutting
Agility
Herblore
Thieving
Fletching
Slayer
Hunter
Summoning
Farming
Dungeoneering
Construction

Bosses:
Queen Black Dragon
King Black Dragon
Nex
Corporeal Beast
Kree’arra - Armadyl
General Graardor - Bandos
Commander Zilyana - Saradomin
K’ril Tsutsaroth - Zamorak
Kalphite Queen
Chaos Elemental

Minigames:
Clan Wars
Castle Wars
Fight Caves
Godwars Dungeon
Dominion Tower
Fight Kiln
Barrows
Soul Wars
Pest Control
Stealing Creation

Misc:

  • Co-Op Slayer

  • Clans

  • Survival Minigame (Custom)

  • Shooting Stars

  • Raiding System (Custom)
    [B]Recent Updates:[/B]

  • Setup store at egeville

  • Added portal with teleport interface and teleports!

  • Customized interface and added teleports with some dialogues

  • Added New npc’s and re-arranged diaogues

  • Added Spawn Tab

  • Cleaned up names of the server on interfaces

  • Added new special teleports for Home Portal

  • Added Arcane Point Store, Added Max with store

  • Added new simple starter tutorial

  • added starter gear (Including a Bag of Runes which when opened gives runes)

  • created different difficulties with different XP rates

  • added Difficulty selection after tutorial

  • Added Difficulty Re-setter to reset def, lock XP and change Difficulty at any time.

  • Added ability to teleport in 40- wildy for Legends and God’s

  • Added increased spec restore for Legends and Gods

  • Added ::mode (Shows players what game mode you are playing on)

  • Made the wilderness ditch turn off your skin overrides when entering wildy

  • Cleaned up commands list

  • Added Completionist Cape Stand

  • Added Herblore store with full potion Decanting!

  • Added Fishing Spawns

  • Re-made Summoning (Added shop and working Obelisk)

  • Stabled XP RATES! (Few rates still need work)

  • Added Arcane Points for 99’s

  • Fixed up prices for Skins

  • Added working Artefact for QBD and KBD teleport

  • Added missing NPCS (Slayer, Jadinkos, Glacors, Polypore dung)

  • Added Bandits Teleport for training

  • Added bonuses to a few items

  • Added special starter gear for Legend and God modes

  • Added TzHaar whip Upgrade

  • Added Arcane Points for killing bosses

  • Added New Slayer system

  • Added Slayer Points system

  • Added Slayer Teleports

  • Added Crystal Chest with Crystal Key creation and Caskets

  • Added Item on Item Smithing (Gano, Dfs etc)

  • Brand New Client! V1

  • Armour Sets added

  • ::gear command added (admins only currently)

  • Point stores add with point systems working

  • Fountain of Heroes added

  • Added Slayer Helmet creation and Flower game

  • Simple Livid Farm minigame added (Needs improvements)

  • Bones on Altar added/ Prayer XP Stabled

  • Added untradable items

  • Added Musician Resting (Needs to multiply rate still)

  • Cache Sprites Fixed

  • Fixed Prices

  • Added Spawns to Novice Spawn Button

  • Setup PvP Killstream rewards (Still need more work)

  • Added PvP Points and custom PvP Store
    [/CENTER]

[B][SIZE=4]Much more to come…![/B]

Credits: Matrix Development Team, King J Scape (For Cache)
Developer & Owner: Arcane
Start date: January 2014
Thanks for reading!

[/center]
